attributes.action: We demand a legal-action criminal inquiry into the Panama Papers.
attributes.background: We demand an independent (Legal action) inquiry into the Panama Papers and that should the inquiry show that any politician is shown to be linked and/or profiteering from tax-haven linked UK tax avoidance they should resign or be removed from office immediately and monies recovered.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament do not have the power to start a criminal investigation. That would be a matter for the police. 

We already have a petition calling for an independent inquiry, which you might like to sign instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126661
